field_descriptions.code: Optional. Voucher code (3-50 characters). If not provided, will be auto-generated.
field_descriptions.discountValue: Required. The discount amount. For percentage: 0-100 (e.g., 20 = 20% off), for fixed: any positive number (e.g., 50 = $50 off).
field_descriptions.expirationDate: Required. ISO 8601 date format. Must be in the future.
field_descriptions.usageLimit: Required. Maximum number of times this voucher can be used (minimum 1).
field_descriptions.minimumOrderValue: Optional. Minimum order value required to use this voucher. If not provided, no minimum is required.
field_descriptions.isActive: Optional. Boolean to enable/disable the voucher. Defaults to true.
